content.text:
# Draft:List of regions that want independence

# Kosovo (De facto independence - International recognition) - Serbia or Albania
# Somaliland (De facto independence) - Somalia
# Kurdistan - Turkey, Iraq, Syria, Iran
# Quebec - Canada*
# Western Sahara (Partial De facto independence - International recognition) - Morocco/Mauritania
# Catalonia - Spain and sometimes France
# Abkhazia and South Ossetia (De facto independence - International recognition)
# Basque Country - Spain and France
# Scotland - United Kingdom**Half of people want independence
References
